page.title: 07St Helens Caravan Park
page.content: It is situated close to the site of a bronze age settlement, the remains of which are to be seen in the Rotunda museam Scarborough. Everything you need is here central shower block with hot showers and hot water, razor points, hair dryers fully equipped laundrette andshop open all season gas cylinders , electricity points, telephone and information room. There is an adventure playground for the youngsters it has swings, slides and a clmbing frame,plus all the fun of nature trails and hides.So to see you will come back again to ride, fish,sail or swim or play golf to visit ancient York,Whitby, Robin Hoods Bay and Scarborough, only 6 miles from St Helens the camping and caravan park in North Yorkshires own national park.
